Grow Almonds with Treehouse

Almond growers in California appreciate the value, returns and transparency that Treehouse Almonds provides.

contact us

Almond Products & Ingredients

Treehouse is California’s most prestigious grower-owned almond supplier, offering customers peerless quality due to our vertical integration, supply chain control and sophisticated processing in an almond-only facility.

Contact Us

Shipping

We’re growing the market so you can grow your business.

The Almond Project

Treehouse California Almonds and one of its third-generation almond growers are proud partners in The Almond Project, a multi-year initiative aimed at advancing more sustainable almond farming methods.

How We Work

We treat our almond farmers like family, handling their crops as if they were our own. We provide our growers with complete market price transparency, including regular updates on the sales price of their almonds. Treehouse adds value to almonds through processing, which allows for greater profitability in the marketplace – and some of the industry’s highest financial returns for our almond growers.

Extracting top value from your crop

Our value-add model enables higher profitability

Full transparency while selling

Keeping you up to date on your almonds’ sales prices

Industry-leading returns

Delivering the highest returns to almond growers, year after year

Performance You’ll Appreciate

Treehouse California Almonds has an outstanding track record of delivering the industry-leading returns to our almond growers. Our value-added processing results in almond ingredients and products that attract a diverse array of discerning customers.

By competing further downstream in the marketplace, Treehouse Almonds is able to sell directly to fill customers’ near-term needs and to readily fill urgent supply chain gaps. These advantages translate into greater predictability and superior returns for our almond growers.

Transparency Matters

Treehouse California Almonds handles our almond grower’s crops as if they were our own, providing unparalleled transparency into sales prices, market conditions and other information.

Hulling & Shelling Sustainably

Treehouse takes the almonds our growers deliver, passes them through a 14-stage mechanical separation process to remove hulls and shells, and then sizes and grades the remaining almond kernels.

Our expertise and state-of-the-art equipment ensure that only the best almonds proceed into our production processes.

We strive for a near-zero-waste hulling and shelling process. Outer hulls become nutritious livestock feed. The fibrous shells may power co-generation plants, or serve as landscape mulch.

The Almond Project

Treehouse California Almonds is proud to be a founding member of The Almond Project, a farmer-led partnership to identify more sustainable farming methods and pave the way toward a more resilient future for almonds.

In the short term, this partnership seeks to identify almond farming approaches that improve soil health, increase biodiversity, and empower local farming communities. Longer-term, The Almond Project aims to develop proof points to incentivize farmers and food companies to adopt practices that have the potential to regenerate California’s working lands.
